title: For a demerged Tata Motors, sum of parts will be greater than the whole
description: Under Tata Sons Chairman N Chandrasekaran, the conglomerate plans to halve the number of listed companies. Tata Motors is demerging into two separate entities for commercial vehicles and passenger vehicles to make the governance and management of group companies lighter and more effective.
